sentences.en: Article 16. A custodian should strictly separate its own assets from those under its custody.
sentences.cn: 第十六条　托管人必须将其自有的资产和受托管理的资产严格分开.

sentences.en: Augustine Hancock served as an elementary-school custodian for 20 years.

sentences.en: Benitez believes his custodian is among the top five in world football.

sentences.en: Commercial banks act as an independent third - party funds custodian.

sentences.en: Dont dally, go get it, said the custodian.

sentences.en: Each investor can designate one custodian only.

OK, I see we've got custodian services on the agenda.

sentences.en: She quite enjoyed the sensation of bovine ignorance with which the Cook's tourist surrenders custodian.

sentences.en: The former Rennes custodian believes winning sides need the ability to attack and defend equally well.
sentences.cn: 这位前雷恩门将认为,球队要获胜,进攻和防守都应同样出色.
